name: 桑之巫韻︰萬花華鬥 Song of Morus: Kaleido Combat
name_original: 桑之巫韻︰萬花華鬥 Song of Morus: Kaleido Combat
description:
Things went south when a taoist priestess and a catholic nun argued what to do with a captured vampire. This is an isometric shooting game with characters dueling inside a kaleidoscope 3d labyrinth.

This is a mini game developed for global game jam 2022, focusing on a shoot'em up bossfight, inside a shifting 3d kaleidoscope scene. the development is more complicated than it looks, as both rendering and physics needs lots of customization.

I may keep expand this game so please subscribe

Control

WASD - move
Mouse - aim
Space - float
Left Click (hold) - shoot 
Esc - pause/quit

Hint

Please remember you can float.
The bullet hitbox is smaller than it looks.
Ths game is easier than it looks, just focus on your area.
